body_text:
Alright, I've corrected the approach and use the strings we use in the recipe arguments accordingly. However, I'm having trouble figuring out how to actually read the recipe's arguments from within PreferenceExperiments.jsm. I've found that the RecipeRunner has access to the recipe object, but I couldn't figure out how to pass that into the PrefExperiments file.
Any suggestions?
body:
Alright, I've corrected the approach and use the strings we use in the recipe arguments accordingly. _However,_ I'm having trouble figuring out how to actually read the recipe's arguments from within `PreferenceExperiments.jsm`. I've found that the RecipeRunner has access to the `recipe` object, but I couldn't figure out how to pass that into the PrefExperiments file.

Any suggestions?
